text: Gilberto Trindade de Souza Neto (born 26 June 1993), known as Gilberto Neto or simply Gilberto, is a Brazilian footballer who plays as a forward for Patrocinense on loan from Marcílio Dias. ==Career statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |- ! rowspan="2"|Club ! rowspan="2"|Season ! colspan="3"|League ! colspan="2"|State League ! colspan="2"|Cup ! colspan="2"|Continental ! colspan="2"|Other ! colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan="3" valign="center"|Marília |2014 |Paulista A2 |colspan="2"|—||10||3||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||10||3 |- |2015 |Paulista |colspan="2"|—||12||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||12||0 |- ! colspan="2"|Subtotal ! colspan="2"|—!!22!!3!!colspan="2"|—!!colspan="2"|—!!colspan="2"|—!!22!!3 |- |valign="center"|Ituano |2015 |Paulista |colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||2||0||colspan="2"|—||13All appearance(s) in Copa Paulista||0||15||0 |- |valign="center"|Oulu |2016 |Ykkönen |24||2||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||24||2 |- ! colspan="3"|Career total !24!!2!!22!!3!!2!!0!!0!!0!!13!!0!!61!!5 |} ==References== ==External links== * * Gilberto at ZeroZero Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Brazilian expatriate footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Campeonato Brasileiro Série D players Category:Ykkönen players Category:Marília Atlético Clube players Category:Ituano FC players Category:AC Oulu players Category:Guarani de Palhoça players Category:Maringá Futebol Clube players Category:Clube Náutico Marcílio Dias players Category:Joinville Esporte Clube players Category:Camboriú Futebol Clube players Category:Clube Atlético Patrocinense players Category:Brazilian expatriate sportspeople in Finland Category:Expatriate footballers in Finland
